A '''stone slab''' is a [[stone]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Stone slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Stone Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Stone slabs can generate in some [[Overworld]] [[ruined portal]]s.

=== Crafting ===

}}

=== Note blocks ===
Stone slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
